# Resources Docs

> Learning resources, samples, and reference materials for AI development in .NET. Includes links to Azure AI documentation, Semantic Kernel samples, and community resources. Start with the Generative AI for Beginners course for foundational concepts.

- [Azure AI learning resources](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/resources/azure-ai.md): This article provides a list of resources about Azure AI scenarios for .NET developers, including documentation and code samples.
- [Learning resources to get started with AI in .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/resources/get-started.md): This article provides a list of resources for .NET developers who are starting to build AI apps with .NET.
- [MCP server learning resources](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/ai/resources/mcp-servers.md): This article provides a list of resources for .NET developers who are building MCP servers.
